hints.content:
We start at $5{:}15$ when Maricel starts getting ready.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 5:00, 5:15, 5:30, and 5:45 are labeled. A red circle appears on the 5:15 tick mark. !

A number line labeled 5:00 to 5:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 5:00, 5:15, 5:30, and 5:45 are labeled. A series of two arrows are shown moving left to right from the 5:15 tick mark to the 5:33 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 5:15 tick mark and ends at the 5:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 15. The second arrow starts at the 5:30 tick mark and ends at the 5:33 tick mark and is labeled plus 3. !

hints.content:
Marciel finished getting ready at $\blueD{5{:}33} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{5{:}33}$?

When Maricel finishes getting ready for dance class, the clock shows:


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 6. !

question.content:
It takes Maricel $18$ minutes to get ready for dance class.  Maricel starts getting ready at $5{:}15 \text { p.m.}$

**What  time does the clock show when Maricel is ready for dance class?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand at the 5 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a3b169bc28dd2a5b34b6c752e8c145c4a73d0e81)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1ae2801d05c19c3012eb54c73933cddfa68c0893)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 5 and 6 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a34d460c0148e891791a8190ddb3e32d78e246cf)
